description: Lists resources associated with a channel configuration.

parameters.name: ChatConfiguration
parameters.description: The channel configuration to list associations for.

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: The resources associated with this channel configuration.

nested_items.name: Resource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource (for example, a custom action).

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An optional token returned from a prior request. Use this token for pagination of results from this action. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only results beyond the token, up to the value specified by MaxResults.
